comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: What is this item being shown off?

comment.author: 77015680@N05
comment._content: The most we know for certain is that it is (likely, by the date type on bottom right) a November 1956 photo taken in Benton County, Mississippi.
comment.authorname: Mississippi Department of Archives and History

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: Even blowing it up to the largest size I can't quite read the writing under "Triumph" that I hoped would give a clue. It clearly looks like it is rotary in nature, a sorter of some type? I'm a city boy and not very familiar with such machinery. I'm going to post a request for this to go to my Science, Technology, History group and hope somebody there might know.
